svg.text: Uses LRU cache for parsed data
Scans raw file data in parallel
• Lazy loading: Only parse visible/expanded JSON nodes → Handle 500MB+ files efficiently
• Memory efficiency: Track file offsets instead of loading entire files → Minimal RAM usage
• Parallel processing: Background search with Rayon, responsive UI with async tasks → No blocking
• Smart caching: LRU cache prevents re-parsing frequently accessed data → Speed optimization
